Question.Subject: My Internet Does Not Work, plz help?
Question.Content: I have Vista and a Linksys Router.I was on Youtube with Chrome and it stopped working. I check with Internet Explorer but it didnt work either. But the strange thing is my IPod touch internet work fine. plz help Im not good with computer.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I had a problem where Internet explorer wasn't working or when it did it would look for the home page but got so far and stuck.
To fix my internet explorer I
Click on Start button Go to All Programs Go to Accessories I double Clicked on Command Prompt
This will bring up a Black window
Type netsh press enter type winsock reset catalog press enter
I rebooted my computer and my frends internet explorer now works.
Hope this works

Answer.Content: may be something wrong with your internet connection. try another browser

I had a problem where Internet explorer wasn't working or when it did it would look for the home page but got so far and stuck.
To fix my internet explorer I
Click on Start button Go to All Programs Go to Accessories I double Clicked on Command Prompt
This will bring up a Black window
Type netsh press enter type winsock reset catalog press enter
I rebooted my computer and my frends internet explorer now works.
Hope this works
